DocAttribute.Name: RelatingPort
DocAttribute.Documentation: Reference to the first port that is connected by the objectified relationship.

DocAttribute.Name: RelatedPort
DocAttribute.Documentation: Reference to the second port that is connected by the objectified relationship.

DocAttribute.Name: RealizingElement
DocAttribute.Documentation: Defines the element that realizes a port connection relationship.

DocWhereRule.Name: NoSelfReference
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The instance of the _RelatingPort_ shall not be the same instance as the _RelatedPort_.
